feed.title: bknd Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: lodash-es/* imports causing crash on astro by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/18

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Official docker image by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/11
  • Refactor: Module Manager by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/19
  • Refactor: Improve dependencies by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/21
  • Refactor: Improved Admin basepath by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/22
  • Improved and simplified bun/node adapters by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/23

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3.0

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Admin UI fixes by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/28
  • fix: only sync config table once certain it has to happen by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/26

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • admin ui: fix initial entity state in create modal by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/29

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.3.1...v0.3.2

entry.title: New release for bknd: v0.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • admin ui: fixing condition where entity has been created with empty label by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/30
  • optimize client-side api & hooks by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/31
  • node media storage local adapter by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/25
  • improved cloudflare worker adapter by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/27
  • optimize seeding, adding api typing support by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/32
  • unified framework and runtime adapters by @dswbx in https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/pull/34

Doc Updates

  • added extensive setup instructions at https://docs.bknd.io/setup/introduction
  • added initial structure & seeding instructions at https://docs.bknd.io/setup/database#initial-structure
  • updated integrations: frameworks and runtimes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bknd-io/bknd/compare/v0.3.2...v0.4.0
